SYSTEM_MSG.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

valuePath.content: You want to collaborate with a company. You meet Suresh, the CEO. You can ask Suresh to introduce you to to technical managers: Ramesh and Reeta. Ramesh can introduce you to his two employees, Karuna and Bunty. Reeta can introduce you to her two employees, Anita and Sunny. Karuna has 4 rating for friendly collaboration while Bunty has a rating of 2. Anita has a rating of 2.5 while Sunny has a rating of 3.5. You can only have one person to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee do you want to be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

transReval.content: Now assume that you have been told that Karuna is leaving the company. Assume you can only have one employee to start your collaboration, which one should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

rewardReval.content: Now imagine before you can act on that decision, you check another rating app where the friendly collaboration rating now for Anita is 4.2 while for Sunny, it is 2.5. You now check the app for Rameshâ€™s team and you find that the friendly collaboration rating is 3.8 for Karuna and 2.3 for Bunty. Remember that you can only have one employee to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

teleShortcut.content: You are now invited to gala dinner where you can reach out to anyone you want Remember that you can only have one employee to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

teleDetour.content: This time you meet the investor in the company, Vik. Vik can introduce you to anyone you would like. When you talk to Suresh and choose the path that led to the highest friendly collaboration previously, you discover that Suresh and Ramesh are now having creative differences. Remember that you can only have one employee to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

nonteleShortcut.content: After talking to Suresh, he offered to connect you directly to Karuna. Remember that you can only have one employee to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

nonteleDetour.content: Now, Suresh texts you that he can introduce you to CFO, John. John is married to Karuna. When you meet Suresh and choose the path that led to the employee with highest friendly collaboration rating previously, you discover that the regular path to that employee is no longer working. You go back to talking to Suresh. You can only have one employee to start your collaboration. Starting from Suresh, which employee should you be introduced to for the highest friendly collaboration rating? Please list the path to the employee in order, separated by commas.

1stepPath.content: From Reeta what is the shortest path to Anita? Please list the employees in order, separated by commas.

2stepPath.content: From Suresh what is the shortest path to Anita? Please list the employees in order, separated by commas.
